overview:
Heath is an entrepreneur and award-winning designer, with over 20 years of experience working around the world for many of the world’s leading design and communication agencies, including Sapient, where he joined as one of the founding Creative Directors. After leaving Sapient he became one of the only external consultants appointed to Freeserve’s brand committee and in 2009 was appointment to Camelot’s (National Lottery) brand steering committee. Heath also frequently lectures at events concerned with the future of design and digital trends.

In 2010 Heath, together with Jordan, created Odelay.co.uk – a socially connect and technically advanced marketplace.
